// Pivot 0, 0
int U_light[14] = {
	7, 1,
	15, 10,
	12, 14,
	5, 13,
	0, 7,
	2, 1,
	7, 1
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float U_light[14] = {
	0.437500f, 0.071429f,
	0.937500f, 0.714286f,
	0.750000f, 1.000000f,
	0.312500f, 0.928571f,
	0.000000f, 0.500000f,
	0.125000f, 0.071429f,
	0.437500f, 0.071429f
};
